title: RRB NTPC stage 2 exam results expected by March 15, says rail official | education$career | Hindustan Times
text:
RRB NTPC stage 2 exam results expected by March 15, says rail official education Updated: Feb 21, 2017 19:38 IST Nilesh Mathur Hindustan Times, New Delhi PThe results of Railway Recruitment Board (RRB) Non-Technical Popular Category (NTPC) second stage examination (CBT) are expected to be declared by March 15.(Getty Images/iStockphoto) 
The results of Railway Recruitment Board (RRB) Non-Technical Popular Category (NTPC) second stage examination (CBT) are expected to be declared by March 15. 
Talking to Hindustan Times, a senior Indian Railways official (who did not want to be named) said on Tuesday, “the results of RRB NTPC second stage examination are expected in about 20-25 days or by March 15.” 
RRB has already released the answer keys of the second stage of the examination. About 3 lakh candidates, who had cleared the first stage, were called for the second stage of the exam. Read more SSC MTS exam 2017: Detailed strategy to clear paper 1; section-wise analysis 
The examination is being conducted to fill 18,252 vacancies. About 92 lakh aspirants had applied for the first stage of the examination. 
The advertisement (CEN 03/2015) regarding the exam, published in December 2015, sought to recruit people for various posts, including assistant station master, clerk, goods guard, typist, apprentice and junior accounts assistant. 
Note: Please keep visiting RRB’s official website for latest updates. tags
